activities: Our organization provides an electronic method of delivering informed consent for Clinical trial participants.   Our system delivers the consent document and supporting multimedia descriptions and explanations, optionally provides a self-assessment, and collects an electronic signature and typed name either through a tablet interface (e.g. Apple iPad) or desktop or laptop computer.  The personal information is encrypted and transmitted over a secured connected, and subsequently stored on our database servers that are hosted in a secure data center in Amsterdam, Netherlands.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: email address and typed name.  These are encrypted and highly protected, in compliance with US HIPAA rules, and accessibly only by authorised individuals who need to access this information under compliance with Privacy rules and laws.
recoursemech: TRUSTe is engaged to support this area.
